name: Pickled Beats
description:
Pickled Beats is a game where you create a garden that in turn generates unique music.

Move with WASD. Plant a plant with E. Water a plant with Q. Remove a plant with R. Choose what plant you would like to plant with the number keys.

Some tips: Multiple plants of the same type cannot go in the same column. The darker soil plays the instrument throughout the entire song. The lighter soil plays the instruments from left to right.
